attributes.action: Take serious action to trace and punish the alleged two million minority of "illegal" drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more rules and regulations are raised against the law abiding majority of motorists it would seem that the number of illegal uninsured, untaxed unlicenced and therefore illegal drivers increases. With the decrease of Traffic Police this option is increasingly attractive to more people and therefore an additional burden on the law abiding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
